price: Wͻde abusuabͻ ato (Nyankopͻn) ne Jinn ntεm. Ampa sε Jinnfoͻ no nim yie sε wͻbεba (atemmuo mu wͻ Nyankopͻn anim).
arabic: وَجَعَلُواْ بَيۡنَهُۥ وَبَيۡنَ ٱلۡجِنَّةِ نَسَبٗاۚ وَلَقَدۡ عَلِمَتِ ٱلۡجِنَّةُ إِنَّهُمۡ لَمُحۡضَرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalū baynahu wabayna al-jinati nasaban walaqad ʿalimati al-jinatu innahum lamuḥ'ḍarūna
